bio: I'm a front-end dev with full-stack experience that enjoys building well tested and accessible React apps that solve customer problems. I've worked as a freelancer both as a software engineer and previously as a dancer so I have experience delivering high quality results under pressure, communicating and working well with others.

I consider myself a life-long student who loves problem solving. I have the experience to start contributing from day one and I am truly excited about my next opportunity. Looking for open roles in the Philadelphia area or remote. Thank you for considering me and looking forward to talking to you soon.

testimonials.text: Elrey has the rare combination of technical skill, strategic vision, and team orientation. I asked him and three others to take over the development of a complex application that generates an unlimited number of math problems of an unlimited variety of problem types based on whatever parameters a user inputs. It took just a matter of hours before he had internalized the project code and made a plan to make it considerably more efficient and easy to understand. He works seamlessly on his own and with others, is well-respected and appreciated by his colleagues, and carries and ethic and initiative that lets him bring elegant solutions to complex problems. I was sad to lose him, and whoever gets him next will be very, very lucky to have him.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
